## compute z-score

```{r}
x = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)
y = 

(x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
```

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
  
}
```

Try out the function

```{r, error = TRUE}
z_scores(x)

z_scores(x = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE))

z_scores("My name is Jared")

z_scores(iris)

z_scores(3)
```

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x should be longer than 3")
  }
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  z
}
```

## Multiple outputs

```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("x should be longer than 3")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  list(mean = mean_x, 
       sd = sd_x,
       z_score = (x - mean(x)/sd(x)))
}
```

```{r}
mean_and_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("Argument x should be numeric")
  } else if (length(x) < 3) {
    stop("Argument x should be longer than 3")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  sd_x = sd(x)

  tibble(
    mean = mean_x, 
    sd = sd_x
  )
}
```

```{r}
mean_and_sd(x)
```
